Disdikbud Pandeglang Ogah Urusi Belasan Siswa PKL yang Dianiaya
06 Nov 2019, 12:21 by Dendy Fachreinsyah


Disdikbud Pandeglang Ogah Urusi Belasan Siswa PKL yang Dianiaya

KBRN, Pandeglang : Dinas Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan (Disdikbud) Kabupaten Pandeglang, ogah mengurusi kasus penganiayaan yang dialami 15 siswa asal SMKN 3 Pandeglang saat mengikuti kegiatan Praktek Kerja Lapangan (PKL) disebuah kapal nelayan.Dindikbud beralasan, kini SMK bukan lagi urusan Pemerintah Kabupaten Pandeglang, melainkan sudah diambil alih oleh Pemerintah Provinsi Banten.
Baca juga: 15 Siswa Pandeglang Disiksa Saat Menjalani PKL di Kapal Nelayan
"Urusan sana dong, provinsi. Itu ranah kewenangannya Provinsi Banten. Kita tidak bisa masuk ke ranah sana. Tanyakan sama yang bersangkutan," kata Kepala Dindikbud Pandeglang, Taufik Hidayat saat ditemui usai Rapat Paripurna di DPRD Pandeglang, Rabu (6/11/2019).Taufik menjelaskan, akibat kewenangan yang sudah diambil alih itu lah, yang membuat Dindikbud enggan "menyusup" ke SMKN 3 Pandeglang untuk mengurus persoalan tersebut."Tidak ada kewenangan apapun di Dindikbud Pandeglang. Kewenangannya dari mulai KBM, pendanaan, dan lain sebagainya sudah pindah ke provinsi," imbuhnya.Walaupun yang menjadi korban merupakan warga Pandeglang, namun Taufik bergeming tidak bisa berbuat banyak. Sebab Dindikbud Provinsi Banten lah yang dianggap harus turun tangan.Â "Meskipun korbannya warga Pandeglang, tapi kami tidak bisa masuk ke ranah sana. Kalau kita melihat tidak bisa berbuat apa-apa. Kewenangan kita bukan," tegasnya kekeh.
Baca juga: Tim Psikososial Akan Advokasi SMKN 3 Pandeglang Soal Penganiayaan Belasan Siswa PKL
Bahkan ketika disinggung untuk menjalin koordinasi pun, mantan Kepala Dinas Pemberdayaan Masyarakat dan Pemerintahan Desa itu belum tertarik melakukannya."Belum ada rencana untuk koordinasi," tutupnya singkat.Sebelumnya diberitakan, sebanyak 15 siswa SMK Negeri 3 Pandeglang jurusan Nautika Penangkap Ikan mengalami nasih nahas saat mengikuti PKL disebuah kapal nelayan. Belasan siswa tersebut dianiaya oleh ABK senior saat berlayar mencari ikan ke lautan Papua.Kejadian itu bermula saat para siswa PKL berangkat dari Pelabuhan Perikanan di Kecamatan Juwana, Kabupaten Pati, Jawa Tengah, sekitar dua bulan lalu menggunakan kapal berkapasitas 200 gross tonnage (GT).Namun selama diperjalanan, belasan siswa itu malah mendapat perlakuan tidak menyenangkan karena kerap disiksa oleh ABK. Bahkan ironisnya, mereka harus mengkonsumsi makanan sisa dari orang lain.

Disdikbud Pandeglang Refuses to Take Care of Dozens of Persecuted PKL Students
Nov 6, 2019, 12:21 by Dendy Fachreinsyah


Disdikbud Pandeglang Refuses to Take Care of Dozens of Persecuted PKL Students

KBRN, Pandeglang: Department of Education and Culture (Disdikbud) of Pandeglang Regency, unwilling to take care of cases of persecution experienced by 15 students from SMKN 3 Pandeglang when participating in Field Work Practices (PKL) on a fishing boat. , but has been taken over by the Banten Provincial Government.
Also read: 15 Pandeglang Students Tortured While Undergoing Street Vendors on Fishing Boats
"Affairs there, province. That is the area of authority of the Banten Province. We cannot enter the domain there. Ask the relevant parties," said the Head of Education and Culture Pandeglang, Taufik Hidayat when met after the Plenary Meeting at the Parliament of Pandeglang, Wednesday (11/06/2019) ). Taufik explained, it was due to the authority that had been taken over, which made Dindikbud reluctant to "infiltrate" SMKN 3 Pandeglang to deal with the problem. "There is no authority whatsoever in Pandeglang Education and Culture Agency. moved to the province, "he added. Even though the victims were Pandeglang residents, Taufik did not budge and could not do much. Because Banten Province Education and Culture Agency is considered to have to intervene. "Even though the victims are Pandeglang residents, but we cannot enter the realm there. If we see we cannot do anything. Our authority is not," he stressed.
Also read: Psychosocial Team Will Advocate SMKN 3 Pandeglang About the Persecution of Dozens of PKL Students
Even when it was mentioned to establish coordination, the former Head of the Community Empowerment and Village Government Office was not yet interested in doing it. "There are no plans for coordination," he concluded briefly. following a street vendor on a fishing boat. Dozens of students were persecuted by senior ABK while sailing for fish to the Papua sea. The incident began when PKL students departed from the Fishery Port in Juwana District, Pati Regency, Central Java, about two months ago using a 200 gross tonnage (GT) boat. But during the trip, dozens of students were even treated unfavorably because ABK was often tortured. Even ironically, they have to consume leftovers from other people.
